mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_no AS cartNo , c.create_date AS createDate , go.goods_No AS goodsNo , gf.goods_file_name AS goodsFileName , gf.goods_file_ext AS goodsFileExt , go.goods_Title AS goodTitle , go.goods_Price AS goodsPrice , ca.category_title AS categoryTitle , c.cart_amount AS cartAmount , (c.cart_amount * go.goods_Price) AS totalPrice FROM cart c INNER JOIN goods go ON go.goods_no = c.goods_no INNER JOIN goods_category gc ON go.goods_no = gc.goods_no INNER JOIN category ca ON ca.category_no = gc.category_no LEFT OUTER JOIN goods_file gf ON go.goods_no = gf.goods_no WHERE c.customer_email = #{customerEmail}

SELECT c.cart_no AS cartNo , go.goods_No AS goodsNo , gf.goods_file_name AS fileName , go.goods_Title AS goodTitle , go.goods_Price AS goodsPrice , c.cart_amount AS cartAmount , (c.cart_amount * go.goods_Price) AS totalPrice FROM cart c INNER JOIN goods go ON go.goods_no = c.goods_no LEFT OUTER JOIN goods_file gf ON go.goods_no = gf.goods_no WHERE c.cart_no = #{cartNo}
